lead_paragraph: South Africa captain Faf du Plessis will face a ball-tampering hearing at 3:30 p.m. local time (0500 GMT) on Tuesday in Adelaide, the International Cricket Council said, putting his participation in the third test against Australia in doubt.

headline.print_headline: Du Plessis to Face Ball-Tampering Hearing Before Adelaide Test
headline.main: Du Plessis to Face Ball-Tampering Hearing Before Adelaide Test

snippet: South Africa captain Faf du Plessis will face a ball-tampering hearing at 3:30 p.m. local time (0500 GMT) on Tuesday in Adelaide, the International Cricket Council said, putting his participation in the third test against Australia in doubt....
